titleStmt.title: The maiden-warrier, or, The damsels resolution to fight in field, by the side of Jockey her entire love to an excellent new tune.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Printed in 4 columns, with 2 woodcut illustrations.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
